actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the deduction for interest on indebtedness incurred to acquire an automobile during a 1-year period.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to restore the deduction for interest on an automobile loan for indebtedness incurred after December 31, 1991, and before January 1, 1993.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the deduction for interest on indebtedness incurred to acquire an automobile during a 1-year period.
